chapter.text: wal-turi
wakitabin masturin
fi raqqin manshurin
wal-bayti l-maʿmuri
wal-saqfi l-marfuʿi
wal-bahri l-masjuri
inna ʿadhaba rabbika lawaqiʿun
ma lahu min dafiʿin
yawma tamuru l-samau mawran
watasiru l-jibalu sayran
fawaylun yawma-idhin lil'mukadhibina
alladhina hum fi khawdin yalʿabuna
yawma yudaʿʿuna ila nari jahannama daʿʿan
hadhihi l-naru allati kuntum biha tukadhibuna
afasih'run hadha am antum la tub'siruna
is'lawha fa-is'biru aw la tasbiru sawaon ʿalaykum innama tuj'zawna ma kuntum taʿmaluna
inna l-mutaqina fi jannatin wanaʿimin
fakihina bima atahum rabbuhum wawaqahum rabbuhum ʿadhaba l-jahimi
kulu wa-ish'rabu hanian bima kuntum taʿmaluna
muttakiina ʿala sururin masfufatin wazawwajnahum bihurin ʿinin
wa-alladhina amanu wa-ittabaʿathum dhurriyyatuhum biimanin alhaqna bihim dhurriyyatahum wama alatnahum min ʿamalihim min shayin kullu im'ri-in bima kasaba rahinun
wa-amdadnahum bifakihatin walahmin mimma yashtahuna
yatanazaʿuna fiha kasan la laghwun fiha wala tathimun
wayatufu ʿalayhim ghil'manun lahum ka-annahum lu'lu-on maknunun
wa-aqbala baʿduhum ʿala baʿdin yatasaaluna
qalu inna kunna qablu fi ahlina mush'fiqina
famanna l-lahu ʿalayna wawaqana ʿadhaba l-samumi
inna kunna min qablu nadʿuhu innahu huwa l-baru l-rahimu
fadhakkir fama anta biniʿ'mati rabbika bikahinin wala majnunin
am yaquluna shaʿirun natarabbasu bihi rayba l-manuni
qul tarabbasu fa-inni maʿakum mina l-mutarabisina
am tamuruhum ahlamuhum bihadha am hum qawmun taghuna
am yaquluna taqawwalahu bal la yu'minuna
falyatu bihadithin mith'lihi in kanu sadiqina
am khuliqu min ghayri shayin am humu l-khaliquna
am khalaqu l-samawati wal-arda bal la yuqinuna
am ʿindahum khazainu rabbika am humu l-musaytiruna
am lahum sullamun yastamiʿuna fihi falyati mus'tamiʿuhum bisul'tanin mubinin
am lahu l-banatu walakumu l-banuna
am tasaluhum ajran fahum min maghramin muth'qaluna
am ʿindahumu l-ghaybu fahum yaktubuna
am yuriduna kaydan fa-alladhina kafaru humu l-makiduna
am lahum ilahun ghayru l-lahi sub'hana l-lahi ʿamma yush'rikuna
wa-in yaraw kis'fan mina l-samai saqitan yaqulu sahabun markumun
fadharhum hatta yulaqu yawmahumu alladhi fihi yus'ʿaquna
yawma la yugh'ni ʿanhum kayduhum shayan wala hum yunsaruna
wa-inna lilladhina zalamu ʿadhaban duna dhalika walakinna aktharahum la yaʿlamuna
wa-is'bir lihuk'mi rabbika fa-innaka bi-aʿyunina wasabbih bihamdi rabbika hina taqumu
wamina al-layli fasabbih'hu wa-id'bara l-nujumi
